meanings.definition: A man who is married to one's mother but is not one's biological father.
meanings.sent1: My stepfathers always support me and care for me like a father.
meanings.sent2: There are many different types of stepfathers in families around the world.
meanings.sent3: When my stepfathers try to dance, it's always a hilarious sight!
meanings.sent4: To me, stepfathers are like guardian angels sent to protect and guide me.
meanings.sent5: The bond between stepfathers and their stepchildren can be just as strong as with biological parents.
